title: Solex Energy plans to invest Rs 1500 cr to expand capacity
description: Solex Energy plans to invest Rs 1,500 crore over three years to expand its manufacturing facility. The company aims to list on the NSE main board by December and raise fresh equity this fiscal year. Solex's module-making capacity will increase from 700 MW to 1.5 GW by December, with further expansions planned by 2027.
